name: Terrorist Invaders
description:
Hello, community!

I want to present my prototype of Terrorist Invaders - my new project about the war in Ukraine that Space Invaders inspire. As a future game designer, I need your opinion about game mechanics!

Here are the questions that are interesting to me:

  • Do you feel fun playing the game?
  • What do you think about player mechanics (movement, shooting)?
  • What do you think about other game mechanics (enemies, aircraft, buildings)?

Share your opinion in the comments - you will help me improve the game before I start making art :)

Controls:

  • Left/Right - move
  • Space - shoot

Game rules:

  • Destroy all waves of invaders (red objects in prototype)
  • Don't let the invaders destroy you (white square in prototype)
  • Don't let the invaders destroy the city (green squares in prototype)
  • Shoot the recon to call support (blue circle in prototype)
